definition: worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: Be responsible for good run of Mersen XD welding system.
sentences.chinese: 负责美尔森贤达焊接质量系统的良好运行。

sentences.english: You are sage while your brother is the head of bandit.
sentences.chinese: 柳下先生你是社会贤达，而令弟却为土匪头。

definition: worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
to establish schools/to raise the standard of education
great person of the past/venerable forebear/the great and the good
a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
experienced scholar/old expert in the field
to be both a farmer and a scholar/to work the land and also undertake academic studies
